localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search
nodes.author: ronatory

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

nodes.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
nodes.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit
nodes.author: Daniel K. Hunter

nodes.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
nodes.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.
nodes.author: John Kellett

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
nodes.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
nodes.title: Gumroad University - A guided tour of our best resources by creators for creators

nodes.title: Profitable design apps database - Database of 60+ hand-curated profitable design apps

nodes.title: S&P 500 ends the year up 18.5%, besting all wall street forecasts in spite of a global pandemic, the largest quarterly economic contraction ever (Q2), and the highest intra-year Unemployment Rate (14.7%) since the Great Depression. $SPX https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY

nodes.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
nodes.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.
nodes.author: Olivier

nodes.excerpt: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
nodes.title: Year of Colour 2020 - Find out which colours you most used on Instagram this year
nodes.author: Stef Lewandowski

nodes.excerpt: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
nodes.title: Record Webcam + Screen > Share - Simple Screen + Webcam Recording. Share after recording
nodes.author: Hammad Akbar

nodes.excerpt: A list of 9,000 badly executed products and apps. Are you looking for project ideas? Then this list could be useful to you. - 2,599 iOS Apps - 1,226 Chrome Extensions - 240 Web Apps (from ProductHunt) - 4,999 Android Apps Airtable access + JSON files
nodes.title: Validated ideas 2.0 - 9,000 popular but poorly executed apps
nodes.author: Huszko Jozsef

nodes.excerpt: A simple application that allows you to generate various copy with just a prompt. Its use ranges from summarizing long text, answering questions, completing thoughts and writing articles. The tool is powered completed by OpenAI's GPT-3 algorithm.
nodes.title: Virtual Ghost Writer - AI copy writer powered by OpenAI
